install.name: Banner Slider
install.author: VietNQ [aFeLiOn]
install.description: Banner Slider for Joomla v1.5. The javascript is based on Featured Content Slider script at DynamicDrive.com

param.name: banners
param.label: Banner ID(s)
param.description: Banner ID of the pictures you wish this module to display. You can display multiple items by seperating the ids by a comma (,)

param.name: categories
param.label: Category ID(s)
param.description: Category ID of the pictures you wish this module to display. You can display multiple items by seperating the ids by a comma (,)

param.name: clients
param.label: Client ID(s)
param.description: Client ID of the pictures you wish this module to display. You can display multiple items by seperating the ids by a comma (,)

param.name: type
param.label: Display only
param.description: Type for displaying.**Image: Display only Banners which Image is slelected. **Custom Banner Code: Display only Banners which Custom Code is not empty. **Both: Display the Image of Banners, if it is not setted, display the Custom Code.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: The width of the slide show (px)

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: The height of the slide show (px)

param.name: delay
param.label: Delay
param.description: Delay between image change, in milliseconds (ie: 5000 = 5 seconds).

param.name: random
param.label: Random Display
param.description: An optional parameter specifying whether to 'randomize' the display order of the images.

param.name: window
param.label: Open In New Window
param.description: When the image is clicked should it pop up in a new window?

param.name: cache
param.label: Cache
param.description: Using Joomla cache (even if itâ€™s turned off)
